alert.note: Alert for Cameron Island; Kenedy Island; Willacy Island (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued September 30 at 9:07AM CDT until September 30 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 11 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor coastal flooding expected. * WHERE...Kenedy Island, Willacy Island and Cameron Island Counties. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 11 PM CDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Nuisance flooding is expected, with water reaching or pushing into the dunes on South Padre Island. Vehicles, except those with four wheel drive and high wheel bases, will be unable to be driven on the beach. This includes locations north of Public Beach Access #3. Minor to moderate beach erosion is expected.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.

area.areaDesc: Cameron Island; Kenedy Island; Willacy Island
